abstract: Robert A Pritzker, industrial engineer and philanthropist, dies at age 85.
snippet: Mr. Pritzker and his two brothers built a conglomerate that included the Hyatt hotel chain. A family dispute led to the sale of much of the business.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Pritzker and his two brothers built a conglomerate that included the Hyatt hotel chain. A family dispute led to the sale of much of the business.

headline.main: Robert A. Pritzker Dies at 85; Led Family Business
headline.print_headline: Robert A. Pritzker, 85; Led Family Business
headline.seo: Robert A. Pritzker, 85; Family Conglomerate Included Hyatt
